description: The Feature-Policy response header sets whether a policy-controlled feature, such as an API, may be used in a document. Not to be confused with permissions policy.
description_html: The Feature-Policy response header sets whether a policy-controlled feature, such as an API, may be used in a document. Not to be confused with permissions policy.

discouraged.reason: Feature policy is superseded by permissions policy.
discouraged.reason_html: Feature policy is superseded by permissions policy.

name: Feature policy
